** 14 天運第十四

帝曰：¶

師金曰：¶

彼知美
矉而不知矉之所以美。¶	KR2c0021_086:45a:5:16:6,KR3k0010_001:72a:3:12:5,KR3k0025_069:6a:2:15:3,KR3k0038_065:7b:7:18:12,KR3k0039_004:17a:8:20:2,KR3k0045_104:8b:4:8:3,KR3k0049_021:50a:6:13:5,KR3k0055_261:4a:1:17:4,KR3k0057_015:5a:5:4:65,KR4d0323_001:55a:5:37:47,KR4d0323_033:25a:5:32:40,KR4e0215_002:7b:4:6:5,KR4f0011_016:2b:3:19:1,KR5c0126_014:8a:26:4:42,KR5c0127_043:012a:4:7:47,KR5c0127_043:013a:3:13:47,KR5c0128_016:011b:7:3:2,KR5c0135_015:009a:5:9:11,KR5c0136_008:006b:9:9:8,KR5c0138_005:30b:6:19:3,KR5c0139_016:028a:4:4:30,KR5h0057_004:022b:8:14:25,KR5i0036_003:03p071a:1:7:17
惜乎，¶
而夫子其窮哉！」<pb:KR5c0126_CHANT_014-9a>¶	KR4c0006_002:72b:5:31:151,KR4d0180_002:12a:6:2:4,KR5c0051_005:40b:5:8:3,KR5c0051_005:43a:1:3:3,KR5c0126_014:6a:42:1:30,KR5c0126_014:8a:28:1:42,KR5c0127_043:010b:10:9:47,KR5c0127_043:012a:5:1:47,KR5c0128_016:009b:2:9:2,KR5c0128_016:011b:7:14:2,KR5c0135_015:007b:3:12:10,KR5c0135_015:009a:6:3:11,KR5c0136_008:005b:5:9:7,KR5c0136_008:006b:10:3:8,KR5c0138_005:29a:7:14:3,KR5c0138_005:30b:7:32:3,KR5c0139_016:022b:8:6:25,KR5c0139_016:028a:10:3:30,KR5h0057_004:021b:4:9:24,KR5h0057_004:022b:9:8:25,KR5i0036_003:03p069b:8:13:17,KR5i0036_003:03p071a:1:18:17,KR5i0036_003:03p078b:10:4:18,KR6q0219_002:0040c:23:8:205

# src: ZHUANG 14.5.8 Guo Qingfan 517; Wang Shumin 528; Fang Yong 393; Chen Guying 378
# dating: 8110
然而不可者，无他也，¶	KR5c0126_014:8a:57:1:50
中无主而不止，¶	KR5c0126_014:8a:58:1:50
外无匹而不行。¶	KR5c0126_014:8a:59:1:50

孔子曰：¶

而風化；¶
蟲，
